price: 14.Diggah anu Yallay, cakkil yaqbuden Yalli yok sa как aneewaa kinni, toysa dibuk yoo uqbudaay salat soolis kay addal yoo cussamkeh.
arabic: إِنَّنِيٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدۡنِي وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكۡرِيٓ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innanī anā al-lahu lā ilāha illā anā fa-uʿ'bud'nī wa-aqimi al-ṣalata lidhik'rī
